316.title: Veera
316.description: Can a brother be a mother too? Meet Ranvijay, Veera’s brother who shares an unbreakable bond with her and nurtures her like a mother would.

467.title: Sasural Genda Phool
467.description: Chalk and cheese in most respects, Suhana and Ishaan unite in an arranged marriage and grow in love. But is love enough to survive in a joint family?

527.title: Ek Hazaaron Mein
527.description: Sisters Maanvi and Jeevika can go to any lengths for each other. Follow the sisters’ journey as they stand by each other and find their soulmates.

655.title: Kyunki Saas
655.description: Tulsi Virani sets the example of an ideal bahu, and in time steps up to be a righteous matriarch. Watch her traverse the intricacies of a large family.

693.title: Saathiya 2
693.description: A few years after Anant's death, Gehna has completely turned her life around. In this new journey, will she finally find her perfect partner?

8414.title: Sapna Babul Ka... Bidaai
8414.description: A story of two sisters, Sadhana and Ragini. Though not related by blood, they share an unbreakable bond that is tested time and again!

9567.title: Ishqbaaz
9567.description: Brothers Shivaay, Omkara and Rudra share an unbreakable bond despite their dysfunctional family. What happens when cupid strikes each of them?

18198.title: Eeramaana Rojaavey
18198.description: TODAY'S EP IS DELAYED. Kavya and Jeeva's love story takes a hit when destiny forces them to marry each other's elder siblings. How will these complicated relationships work?

1260000603.title: Pandian Stores
1260000603.description: Sathyamoorthy and his wife Dhanalakshmi sacrifice a lot to raise his brothers Kathir, Jeeva and Kannan. Will things change when the brothers get married?

1260015299.title: Phineas and Ferb
1260015299.description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

1260053090.title: Pandya Store
1260053090.description: Gautam and Dhara sacrifice a lot to raise his brothers Dev, Shiva and Krish while managing the shop. Will things change once the brothers get married?

1260056624.title: Janaki Kalaganaledu
1260056624.description: Putting her IPS hopes aside, Janaki marries Rama Chandra, a confectioner from a traditional family. Will Rama defy his mother and help Janaki fulfil her dreams?

1260066571.title: Tera Mera Saath Rahe
1260066571.description: Talented but timid Gopika fails to match up to her husband's expectations. When she finds a mentor in her mother-in-law, Meethila, things take a turn.

1260066788.title: Best of Luck Nikki
1260066788.description: Dolly creates a video diary about their family and friends containing advice for Nikki when she grows up.

1260075978.title: Gaatchora
1260075978.description: Poles apart, the Bhattacharya sisters get entwined with the lives of the Singharoy brothers. Are marriages really made in heaven?

1260115914.title: Karm Yuddh
1260115914.description: A deadly fire accident at the Roy Group of Industries brings Bhisham Roy under the scanner, inciting a power grab where it's blood versus blood.

1260124584.title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey
1260124584.description: Being brought up in a conservative family, Jaya feels even more trapped when she marries Rajesh, a male chauvinist. How will she break free from these shackles?
1260124584.crisp: Some Coarse Language, Some Violence, Some Mature Content, Action Sequences

1260129377.title: Brahma Mudi
1260129377.description: TODAY'S EP IS DELAYED. The lives of Kavya and her sisters change forever as they cross paths with the Duggiraala brothers. As fate brings them closer, what's in store for them?

1260131146.title: Gulmohar
1260131146.description: Batra family has just four days left to vacate their house of 34 years. Amidst the mayhem, uncertainties of the future, insecurities and secrets surface.

1260132522.title: Chashni
1260132522.description: As different as chalk and cheese, Chandni and Roshni grow up as inseparable sisters. What happens when a tragedy sours their relationship?
